FuncDef:
The radius-attribute hw-acct-terminate-subcause encapsulation-type command configures an encapsulation type of the HW-Acct-Terminate-Subcause attribute.
The undo radius-attribute hw-acct-terminate-subcause encapsulation-type command restores the default configuration.
By default, the HW-Acct-Terminate-Subcause attribute is encapsulated as an integer.
CLIs: undo radius-attribute hw-acct-terminate-subcause encapsulation-type { string | integer }

ParaDef.Info:
Encapsulates the HW-Acct-Terminate-Subcause attribute as a character string.
-

Encapsulates the HW-Acct-Terminate-Subcause attribute as an integer.
-

ExtraInfo: Huawei proprietary attribute HW-Acct-Terminate-Subcause is used to identify the number of a session interruption subcause. After the radius-attribute include HW-Acct-terminate-subcause [ edsg ] command is run in the RADIUS server group view, the Accounting-Stop messages that the device sends to the RADIUS server carry this attribute. To configure an encapsulation type of the HW-Acct-Terminate-Subcause attribute on the device for interworking with a server, run the radius-attribute hw-acct-terminate-subcause encapsulation-type command.
